title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 2600-3.2 - Best practices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 2600-3.2 - Best practices

State Regulations

The best practices set forth in section
2600-4.3
(k) of this Part are statements of practices for all tax return preparers to aspire
to achieve. A violation of a best practice will not alone constitute an act of
misconduct by the preparer sufficient to support a disciplinary
action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
2600-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
